colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (CES DAM TSIG RDO RJE'I BSGOM BZLAS BYA TSUL MDOR BSDUS SU BKOD PA 'DI NI CHU GLANG ZLA TSES DGE BAR BSTAN 'GRO DON SPYI DANG, ,KHYAD PAR MTHA' DBUS YUL DU KUN TU MA SHIS PA'I MTSAN MA'I RING DANG, ,LHAG PAR DAM TSIG NYAMS CHANG DAG PHYIR SKYA MCHOG DMAN MTHA' DAG NAS RGYUN GYI NYAMS LEN BYED RGYUR ^SH'AKYA'I RING LUG 'DZIN PA RJE BTZUN NGAG DBANG SKAL BZANG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME MKHAS GRUB RGYA MTSOS SPEL BA DZA YANTU, ,BKRA SHIS, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG SKAL BZANG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME MKHAS GRUB RGYA MTSO,
